item.title: Photos: Before-and-after satellite images show extent of Texas flooding destruction
item.description: Before-and-after images show how the Guadalupe River surged and devastated towns across Texas.

item.title: DOGE keeps gaining access to sensitive data. Now, it can cut off billions to farmers
item.description: DOGE recently gained high-level access to a database that controls government payments and loans to farmers and ranchers across the U.S.

item.title: Authorities arrest four hackers linked to UK retail hacking spree
item.description: The U.K. National Crime Agency said the suspects are in custody in relation to the hacks targeting Marks & Spencer, Harrods, and the Co-op.
